name: 梅爾
description: 梅爾．梅德拉達是梅德拉達家的推定繼承人，這個家族曾經是諾克薩斯最有權勢的家族之一。儘管梅爾外表是個優雅大方的貴族，但內心卻是一位鐵腕政客，不管遇上誰都會費盡心思摸清對方的底細。與神鬼莫測的黑玫瑰見面後，梅爾揭開了母親的謊言，並首次面對自己可能無法掌控的情況。魔力覺醒後，梅爾便返航歸鄉，尋找答案。儘管一定會有許多人嘗試撲滅她心中的光，但她的反叛精神是永遠無法熄滅的。

wikiSkinData.lore: Mel Medarda is the presumed heir of the Medarda family, once one of the most powerful in Noxus. In appearance she is a graceful aristocrat, but beneath the surface lies a skilled politician who makes it her business to know everything about everyone she meets. After an encounter with the mysterious Black Rose, Mel discovered the depths of her mother's deception and, for once, faced a situation potentially beyond her control. With newly awakened magical abilities, she sailed home in search of answers—and though many still seek to temper the light within her, Mel's soul remains forever defiant.
